thread.title: How To Survive Fashion Week, By Make-Up Didi Aka, Our Favourite Comedienne, Mallika Dua
thread.title_full: How To Survive Fashion Week, By Make-Up Didi Aka, Our Favourite Comedienne, Mallika Dua

title: How To Survive Fashion Week, By Make-Up Didi Aka, Our Favourite Comedienne, Mallika Dua
text:
facebook 374 SHARES 
At the first day of Lakm√© Fashion Week Summer/Resort 2017, we bumped into our favourite diva and comedienne, Mallika Dua. Mallika, also known popularly as her alter ego, "make-up didi ", is all we wish to be, in humour and just plain chilled-outness. So when we met her today, we just had to know her secrets to surviving all that is fashion week. And in true make-up didi fashion, she said: 
" Dekhiye, thoda jaus peejiye...apne aap ko hydrets karna zaroori hai ." 
" Jaus phace pe mat lagaaiye, phace pe crems lagaaiye . And invest in a very nice, jusy beby creams." 
" Aur thoda freewts aur salads hi khaaiye aap...kyunki yahaan par logon ko dekhke, ekdum aisi philings aane lagti hai... " 
" Kapde pehno thode aeji type, jisse dekhke chahe ajeeb hi ho, lekin thode different lage . That's fayshun, ok? Jusht be yauself. Be comfortable, chahe aapko ghagra kyun na pehenna pade. " A video posted by iDiva (@idivaofficial) on Feb 1, 2017 at 4:40am PST 
So, there you have it. To survive Fashion Week, and dare we say it, life in general, do as Mallika Dua says: drink jaus, hydrets yourself (hydration is the key to good skin, after all), put crems on your phace, but more importantly, be yauself! Image credit: Shannon Mikhail Lobo
